name: create-react-adam
description: Create opinionated React apps with TypeScript, Vite, Wouter, and Tailwind CSS
author: Adam

scripts.quick-make: npm link && cd ./tmp && npx create-react-adam test-app-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S) --with-e2e
scripts.cleanup: rm -rf ./tmp && rm -rf ./template/node_modules && rm -rf ./template/dist && rm -rf ./template/package-lock.json && echo 'Template Dev Files Deleted, you must run npm install in the template directory for those features'
scripts.dev: npm run cleanup && TIMESTAMP=$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S) && npm link && cd ./tmp && npx create-react-adam test-app-$TIMESTAMP --with-e2e && cd test-app-$TIMESTAMP && npm run dev
